oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Questions and answers on the topic of Imamat for students of Shia Imami Ismaili schools.
Compiled by Harjībhāî Pûñjā Mastar from Hāsham Bhogā's Ismāîlī Darpaṇ.
Paper covers, binding in poor condition.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.
